userSignup: INSERT INTO users (fullName, username, email, password) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) returning *
userRequest: INSERT INTO requests (userId, rideId, username, message) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) returning *
rideOffer: INSERT INTO rides (userId, departure, destination, time, date, seats, cost, message) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8) returning *
